T02D3159:179a-1: h'a la h'a la s'a dha nam /
T02D3159:179a-3: snying rje khros pa'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3159:179a-4: bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa'i //
T02D3159:179a-5: snying rjes khros la gus pas 'dud //
T02D3159:179b-0: thugs rje'i bdag nyid de @179b yi ni //
T02D3159:179b-1: mdor bsdus sgrub thabs brjod par bya //
T02D3159:179b-2: dang por yid 'ong gnas su ni //
T02D3159:179b-3: tsandan sogs kyis legs byugs la //
T02D3159:179b-4: thang ka bkram sogs la bzhugs pa'i //
T02D3159:179b-5: bcom ldan mchod par bya ba yin //
T02D3159:179b-6: me tog la sogs pa dbul ba'i sngags ni /
T02D3159:179b-7: aom rdo rje'i me tog h'um /
T02D3159:179b-8: aom rdo rje'i bdug pa h'um /
T02D3159:179b-9: aom rdo rje'i mar me h'um zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
T02D3159:179b-10: aom de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad la bdag
T02D3159:179b-11: gi mchod pa'i sprin tshogs 'dis khyab nas nam mkha'i
T02D3159:179b-12: dbyings kun du 'phro bar h'um mchod pa thams cad
T02D3159:179b-14: rab tu mchod nas de mdun du //
T02D3159:179b-15: bde ba'i stan la gnas nas kyang //
T02D3159:179b-16: byams pa skye dgu rnams la bsgom //
T02D3159:179b-17: brtse chen gyis ni rdo rje yang //
T02D3159:179b-18: snying gar zla ba'i steng du ni //
T02D3159:179b-19: sngags yig hr'i: ni rnam bkod la //
T02D3159:179b-20: sangs rgyas dang bcas de sras rnams //
T02D3159:179b-21: gsal bar nam mkha' gang bar blta //
T02D3159:179b-22: hr'i: yig 'od zer mchod pa yis //
T02D3159:179b-23: de dag legs mchod 'khrul bral bar //
T02D3159:179b-24: bsod nams 'phel ba sgrub don du //
T02D3159:179b-25: dang po sdig pa bshags sogs bya //
T02D3159:179b-26: dkon mchog gsum mdun skyabs song la //
T02D3159:179b-27: chos rnams thams cad mchog bdag med //
T02D3159:179b-28: gsal byed snying rje dri med pas //
T02D3159:179b-29: sngags 'di nges par brjod par bya //
T02D3159:179b-30: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa
T02D3159:179b-31: ni bdag rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'o zhes so
T02D3159:179b-32: // sngags don mngon du byed pas na //
T02D3159:179b-33: gzung 'dzin dag las nges grol ba'i ;
T02D3159:179b-34: / dngos kun bdag nyid chen po ba //
T02D3159:179b-35: shes pa tsam du bsgom par bya //
T02D3159:179b-36: hr'i: yig zla ba legs gnas pa //
T02D3159:179b-37: so so rang rig de bltas la //
T02D3159:179b-38: de skyes pad dkar bsgom bya ste //
T02D3159:179b-39: lte ba hr'i: yig dang ldan pa'o //
T02D3159:179b-40: de las sangs rgyas tshogs spro dang //
T02D3159:179b-41: 'gro ba sangs rgyas la yang dgod //
T02D3159:179b-42: slar yang de nyid la bsdus la //
T02D3159:179b-43: phyis ni snying rjes khros rang nyid //
T02D3159:179b-44: rin chen ri bo'i phug rten pa'i //
T02D3159:179b-45: zhal gsum phyag drug zhir gyur pa //
T02D3159:179b-46: padma dmar gnas zla ba la //
T02D3159:179b-47: g-yas brkyang bskyod pas legs bzhugs par //
T02D3159:180a-2: dkar dang ser dang sngon po dang //
T02D3159:180a-3: spyan gsum stag gi sham thabs mnabs //
T02D3159:180a-4: rgyan rnams kun ldan rab tu mdzes //
T02D3159:180a-5: g-yas na mchog sbyin mda' dang phreng //
T02D3159:180a-6: g-yon pa sgeg pa'i dkur brten pa //
T02D3159:180a-7: pad dkar dang ni gzhu nyid kyang //
T02D3159:180a-8: 'gyur ba'i phyag gis bskor bar mdzad //
T02D3159:180a-9: thod pa g-yon na bzhag pa na //
T02D3159:180a-10: me tog sna tshogs kyis rab bkang //
T02D3159:180a-11: g-yas na dug can gyis dkris pa'i //
T02D3159:180a-12: rtse gsum de bzhin padma yang //
T02D3159:180a-13: snang mtha' gtsug tor dam pa ste //
T02D3159:180a-14: thod pa yis ni thong du byas //
T02D3159:180a-15: zla ba phyed pa dang ldan mthong //
T02D3159:180a-16: ral pa dbu rgyan legs par brtsegs //
T02D3159:180a-17: rtog pa'i dra ba rnam bsal ba'i //
T02D3159:180a-19: snying rje khros pa 'dir gyur nas //
T02D3159:180a-20: rang snying mgrin pa spyi rnams su //
T02D3159:180a-21: zla ba sngo dmar dkar rim bzhin //
T02D3159:180a-22: h'um: a'a aom rnams bsgom par bya //
T02D3159:180a-23: de bzhin snying ga bar dag tu //
T02D3159:180a-24: zla la legs gnas hr'i: bsgom bya //
T02D3159:180a-25: de nas gnas g-yo'i dngos gyur pa //
T02D3159:180a-26: de dag de yi gzugs su bsgom //
T02D3159:180a-27: dam min rnam rtog las grol ba'i //
T02D3159:180a-28: mnyam par gzhag pas sngags bzlas te /
T02D3159:180a-29: aom ha l'a ha la hr'i: myur min bul bar ma yin zhing //
T02D3159:180a-30: shin tu gsal bar mang du bzlas //
T02D3159:180a-31: bzlas pa byas nas ci bde bar //
T02D3159:180a-32: gshegs su gsol zhing legs mchod dang //
T02D3159:180a-33: legs par bstod dang brtan byas la //
T02D3159:180a-34: yi ge brgya pa gdon par bya //
T02D3159:180a-35: aom rdo rje sems dpa' dam tshig rjes su bskyang du gsol //
T02D3159:180a-36: bdag rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du nye bar gnas pa brtan par dgongs //
T02D3159:180a-37: bdag la shin tu dgyes par dgongs //
T02D3159:180a-38: bdag la rgyas par mdzad du gsol //
T02D3159:180a-39: bdag la rjes su chags par mdzad du gsol //
T02D3159:180a-40: dngos grub thams cad bdag la legs par stsol //
T02D3159:180a-41: bdag gi las thams cad grub par mdzod //
T02D3159:180a-42: sems nges pa legs par mdzad du gsol /
T02D3159:180a-43: h'um ha ha ha ha ho: bcom ldan 'das de
T02D3159:180a-44: bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad kyi rdo rje'i rang
T02D3159:180a-45: bzhin las bdag la grol bar mdzod //
T02D3159:180b-0: rdo rje'i ngo bo'i dam tshig sems dpa' @180b chen
T02D3159:180b-1: po a'a: aom bdag dang sems can kun don mdzad
T02D3159:180b-2: // dngos grub stsal nas ji bzhin gshegs //
T02D3159:180b-3: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs su gsol //
T02D3159:180b-5: 'di yis legs par bskul byas la //
T02D3159:180b-6: aom a'a yig sgor ni chos rnams kun//
T02D3159:180b-7: gdod nas ma skyes med phyir ro //
T02D3159:180b-9: bsam gtan legs blangs rnal 'byor pas //
T02D3159:180b-10: rang gi nus pa'i sbyin pa gtang //
T02D3159:180b-11: gzugs sogs 'dod pa spyod pa na //
T02D3159:180b-12: ma lus rtog pa gtan nas spangs //
T02D3159:180b-13: bla med byang chub ring min par //
T02D3159:180b-14: sgrub pa po ni dam pas thob //
T02D3159:180b-15: sgrub thabs bris las bdag gis ni //
T02D3159:180b-16: dge ba bla med thob pa gang //
T02D3159:180b-17: des ni 'jig rten ma lus pa //
T02D3159:180b-18: myur bar snying rje'i khro thob shog //
